title: US stocks slide as Putin orders troops into Ukraine. Oil prices near $100 per barrel
content:
1. US stocks slide as Putin orders troops into Ukraine. Oil prices near $100 per barrel  CNN
  2. Global markets plunge, oil prices jump as Russia recognises breakaway Ukraine regions • FRANCE 24  FRANCE 24 English
  3. Oil moves closer to $100 a barrel as Putin puts Russia on war footing  Financial Times
  4. ANALYST VIEW 2 Escalating Russia-Ukraine crisis ripples through markets  Reuters
  5. Nasdaq 100 Futures Fall amid Deepening Ukraine Crisis, APAC Eyes Lower Open  DailyFX
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: プーチンがウクライナに軍を派遣することを命じ、米国株が下落。原油価格は1バレル100ドル近辺
普京命令军队进入乌克兰，美国股市下滑。油价接近每桶100美元
普京命令軍隊進入烏克蘭，美國股市下滑。油價接近每桶100美元
